alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Prairie; Richland; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:54PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Wibaux, southeastern Garfield, southeastern Roosevelt, McCone, northwestern Prairie, northern Dawson and Richland Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 754 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fairview to 13 miles west of Richey to 18 miles northeast of Hillside. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Circle, Fairview, Richey, Bloomfield, Savage, Brockway, Lambert, Flowing Wells Rest Area, Cohagen, Nelson Creek Rec Area, Fort Union Trading Post, Snowden, Enid, Van Norman, Nohly, Wooley, Fort Union, Crane and Weldon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
